/*
		isInt: function(n)
		{
			return typeof n === 'number' && 
			       parseFloat (n) == parseInt (n, 10) && ! isNaN (n);
		},
		decimalPlaces: function (n)
		{
			var
				a = Math.abs(n),
				c = a, count = 1;

			while(! Algorithm .isInt (c) && isFinite (c))
				c = a * Math .pow (10, count ++);
	
			return count-1;
		},
		*/
